page.title: 03 Northern Sector Redeveloped
page.content: Our school,Dumolos Primary and nearby Glascote Heath Primary serve a redevelopment area of local authority, private and housing trust dwellings. The estates are situated on a steep, south facing slope between the B5000 to the north and Kettlebrook to the south. The local authority estate in particular has been has been planned with safety and convenience in mind. Fast traffic is confined to the loop road which circumvents the estate whilst pedestrian ways provide access,via bridges and underpasses to the shops,community centre,public open spaces,schools,and other amenities. Dumolos Primary School was placed at the the centre of the development and, along with the local shops, public house,Health and Community Centres and Library, was intended to provide the hub of local life.
